title: Xabi Alonso - Wikipedia
snippet: Xabier Alonso Olano (Basque: [ˈʃaβi aˈlons̺o oˈlano], Spanish: [ˈʃaβj aˈlonso oˈlano]; born 25 November 1981) is a Spanish professional football manager and former player who is the head coach of La Liga club Real Madrid. Widely regarded as one of the greatest midfielders of his ...

title: Xabi Alonso Biography, Career Info, Records & Achievements
snippet: Xabi Alonso is a former professional Spanish footballer, born on 25 November 1981 in Tolosa, Spain. Xabi has played for Real Sociedad, Liverpool, Real Madrid and Bayern Munich in club football.

title: Xabier Alonso Olano - History and honours | Official website Real Madrid C.F.
snippet: During his time at Anfield he won the European Cup in his first season, netting one of the goals in the final against AC Milan. He earned 114 caps for Spain, with whom he lifted one World Cup and two European Championships. The final team Alonso played for before brining his career to an end was Bayern Munich.

title: Xabi Alonso - Biography - IMDb
snippet: Xabi Alonso was born on November 25, 1981 in Tolosa, Guipúzcoa, País Vasco, Spain. He is an actor, known for Birmingham City vs Liverpool FC (2005), UEFA Euro 2012 (2012) and 2006 FIFA World Cup Germany (2006).

title: Xabi Alonso | Biography & Wiki | VAVEL International
snippet: Xabi Alonso, born on November 25, 1981 in Tolosa, Guipuzcoa, is an emblematic figure of Spanish soccer, known for his precision, technique and leaders
